insured_details.submission_title: Broking Submission for Titan Automotive Components Ltd

risk_overview.introduction: Summit Risk Partners is pleased to present the renewal submission for Titan Automotive Components Ltd. Titan has been a client of Summit for 12 years and represents a highly desirable, well-managed risk. The business has shown consistent profitability and a strong commitment to risk management, with significant capital expenditure in fire suppression and automated machinery over the last 3 years.

business_details.description: Precision manufacturer of aluminium die-cast components for the automotive and aerospace sectors.

risk_management_overview.management_narrative: Titan Automotive maintains a 'safety-first' culture driven by the Operations Director. They employ a full-time NEBOSH-qualified Health & Safety Manager who conducts weekly site audits. The business holds ISO 9001 (Quality), ISO 14001 (Environmental), and IATF 16949 (Automotive Quality) certifications. They have long-standing Tier-2 supply contracts with Jaguar Land Rover and Nissan, necessitating rigorous business continuity planning.
key_features: Full-time NEBOSH qualified Risk Manager employed.
Strict hot work permit system in place.

locations.name: Headquarters & Primary Manufacturing
locations.construction: Steel portal frame, insulated composite panel walls (LPCB approved), reinforced concrete floor, pitched steel roof with 10% roof lights. Built 2010.
locations.occupancy: Administrative offices, CNC machining, die-casting, and finished goods storage.

fire_protection.sprinklers: Full automatic sprinkler system (BS EN 12845 OH3) serviced bi-annually.
fire_protection.detection: Analogue addressable smoke detection throughout, linked to ARC.

security.intruder_alarm: Honeywell Galaxy Dimension, NSI Gold monitored, dual-path signalling (Redcare).
security.cctv: IP CCTV system covering all external doors and perimeter, 30-day recording.
security.perimeter: 2.4m Palisade fencing, electric gated access with ANPR.

locations.name: Distribution Warehouse
locations.address: Plot 4, Halesfield Industrial Estate, Telford, TF7 4LP
locations.construction: Steel frame, brick/block dwarf walls to 2m with single skin metal cladding above. Built 1995.
locations.occupancy: Storage of raw materials (aluminium ingots) and packaging.

fire_protection.detection: Beam detectors in warehouse, point detection in offices.

locations.name: R&D Facility
locations.construction: Modern brick and glass office unit. Built 2018.
locations.occupancy: Design studio, 3D printing, light assembly for prototyping.

loss_history.details: Theft of copper cabling from external yard (Location 2).
loss_history.status: Settled. Security upgraded to include motion-activated lighting.
Settled. Roof fully inspected and maintained.

activities: Annual Fire Risk Assessment (FRA) conducted by external consultant (last completed July 2025).
Thermographic imaging survey of all electrical distribution boards conducted annually.
Weekly fire alarm testing and bi-annual evacuation drills.
Comprehensive preventive maintenance schedule for CNC machines and die-casters.
Metal waste stored in lockable skips, 10m from building line, collected weekly.

employers_liability.description: Employees engaged in CNC machining, die casting, assembly, warehousing, and clerical duties. Strict PPE policy (boots, ear defense, goggles). Machine guarding interlocks tested daily. Forklift drivers must be RTITB certified.

public_and_products_liability.product_description: Precision aluminium components (housings, brackets, mounts) for automotive engines and interiors. No critical safety parts (brakes/steering) manufactured.
public_and_products_liability.sourcing: Raw aluminium sourced from UK and Norway smelters.
public_and_products_liability.site_access: Strictly controlled via gatehouse. Visitors must sign in and wear high-vis vests.

liability_claims_history.details: Employee slipped in loading bay. Minor soft tissue injury.
liability_claims_history.remedial_action: Anti-slip coating applied to loading bay floor.

liability_claims_history.details: Alleged scratch damage to delivery truck by forklift.
